description:
Calculator done the right way!

Calculator Pro is specially designed for your Touchpad. It is easy to use, with elegant interface and offers you much more than original calculator. Calculator Pro includes both standard and scientific calculators - just rotate the Touchpad.

- Standard calculator in portrait view
- Scientific calculator with over 30 functions in landscape view
- Includes root, power, exponential, factorial, logarithm, trigonometric, hyperbolic and other functions
- Degrees and radians calculations
- Memory functions
- Intuitive interface
- Large and comfortable keys

This is the best calculator in App Catalog for your Touchpad. Buy once, use countless times.
